MenuItem.Name: Move Device from one bridge to another...

Field.Label:
If you have moved a light/sensor to a new bridge you can use this menue item. It will keep the old indigo device (ID) and replace it with the properties of the new hue dev on the new bridge Then it will delete the new indigo device, as the old device will have all the properties of the new device This way you can keep names, triggers, actions, scripts, indigo ids etc SEQUENCE: 1. delete device on old bridge with the Hue app (not in indigo) 2. create new Hue device on new Hue bridge (with the Hue app). Indigo will auto create the new device w new bridge number. you will have one orphan(old)indigo device and one new indigo device 3. use this menue (old = device in indigo you want to keep) - select bridge of old device - select bridge of new device - select device you want to keep OLD - select device you want to copy NEW == click execute The OLD indigo device(-new aded to name) will point to the new device on the new Hue bridge and will have its properties copied The NEW indigo device will be deleted in INDIGO as it is a duplicate of the new-old one now, but with a new indigo ID
!!! make sure you select the right devices!!! It Does not work for different device types The plugin only performs a highlevel check on type of bulb/sensor.
